Primary_Text: Тый чай ден кофем налын вет
IPA: təj t͡ɕaj den kof-em nal-ən βet
Analyzed: təj t͡ɕaj den kof-em nal-ən βet
Translation: But you have bought tea and coffee

Primary_Text: Эвалан да Робинлан марий мурым да куштымашым тунемман
IPA: eβalan da robinlan marij murəm da kuʃtəmaʃəm tunemːan
Analyzed: eβa-lan da robin-lan marij murə-m da kuʃtəmaʃ-əm tunem-ːan
Gloss: Eva-DAT and Robin-DAT Mari song-ACC and dance-ACC study-NEC
Translation: Eva and Robin must learn Mari songs and dances
the boy gives a flower to the girl
the police are looking for them
shall I bring you (sg.) coffee or tea?
we are reading an interesting book
to be born ~ to give birth
Would you manage to climb Mount Everest?
I have been writing this article for three weeks

Gloss: acquaintance-1SG concert-INE guitar with play-INF start-NPST.3SG
Translation: My acquaintance will play the guitar in the concert
to put (to a sitting position; a wide, stable object, e.g. a jar)
to put (in a horizontal position, e.g. leave a book lying on a table)
After the exams start, students sleep little
The children were waiting for the circus to come
I didn't catch my flight the day before yesterday
After relaxing a bit, I will start looking for work
As I was rushing, the glass fell out of my hand

Primary_Text: Жап эртыме семын чыла начар мондалтеш
IPA: ʒap ertəme semən t͡ɕəla nat͡ɕar mondalteʃ
Analyzed: ʒap ertə-me semən t͡ɕəla nat͡ɕar mond-alt-eʃ
Gloss: time pass-AN according.to all bad forget-PASS-NPST.3SG
Translation: As time goes by, all bad things are forgotten
Every fruit has its own time
Is the Mari national cuisine tasty?
A letter came from my big brother
The Volga is longer than the Kokshaga

Primary_Text: Нуно ватыж дене нигунам огыт ӱчаше
IPA: nuno βatəʒ dene nigunam ogət yt͡ɕaʃe
Analyzed: nuno βatə-ʒ dene nigunam o-gət yt͡ɕaʃe
Translation: He and his wife never argue

Primary_Text: Самырык годым те почеламутым возеда улмаш
IPA: samərək godəm te pot͡ɕelamutəm βozeda ulmaʃ
Analyzed: samərək godəm te pot͡ɕelamut-əm βoz-eda ulmaʃ
Translation: You wrote poems when you were young, it turns out

Primary_Text: чын йӧратымашым, кудым чылан кычалыт, тыланем
IPA: t͡ɕən jøratəmaʃəm, kudəm t͡ɕəlan kət͡ɕalət, təlanem
Analyzed: t͡ɕən jøratəmaʃ-əm, kudə-m t͡ɕəlan kət͡ɕal-ət, təlan-em
Gloss: true love-ACC which-ACC everybody-INS look.for-NPST.3PL wish-NPST.1SG
Translation: I wish (you) true love, (such) which everyone is looking for
What are you (familiar) doing on Saturday?
Your mother always thinks about you
I was taking a bath when you called
